Follow I’ve suggested on multiple occasions that the relatively obscure agricultural fund, symbol , is a proxy of the China Trade Talks optimism or pessimism. Since it seems prospects aren’t exactly great, we’re selling off on the ags, even though equities don’t’seem to care at all. PowerShares DB Agriculture
